question: Who is the author of the book "Dark Fear, Eerie Cities: New Hindi Cinema in Neo-liberal India‚Äù?
explanation: The book \"Dark Fear, Eerie Cities: New Hindi Cinema in Neo-liberal India\" has been authored by Sarunas Paunksnis. The book analyses the wide array of films made in the early 21st century to offer a philosophical and psychoanalytical critique of the transforming cinematic imaginary - from the pre-1990s feudal family ideal to the contemporary construction of the new middle class\'s subjectivities in the post-colonial context.
